ygData.subject: Re: Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Add my name to the petition please :) Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)
ygData.messageBody:
Add my name to the petition please :)

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)

Wizard wrote:
>
> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> It is important to do big rumor about our petition!
> Im personaly very glad that finaly all of us on this list make one big step
> in right direction so that our voice is also heard.
>
> steps to have any result from our petition are following
>
> a.) send a final text to all major boards (eqvault, eqss etc..)including in
> our group EQ_Wizards@onelist.com and verant email mailto:EQmail@...
> i suggest that a person wich corrected my first propost do it as im not so
> god im english
>
> b.) send a final text to alt.games.everquest ( it will be nice if somone
> who is alredy on send it there)
> and also to all other wich can be interested to show it
>
> c.) all persons wich agree to petition send it personaly to verand adding
> at the end of pettition all personal opinions and ideas to improve gameplay
> to cover all diferences what i have seen to exist over final text.
>
> P.S. i have seen one old nice idea wich can be included in petition or
> added as personal opinion
> Its to have a icon on screen as (we have for shield) for root so when root
> is about to end or when it is broken we can have this icon start pulsating
> and so know that we have 2 sec to start casting new root.
>
> At 11.29 28/05/99 +0200, you wrote:
> >From: =?ISO-8859-1?Q?Rivi=E8re_St=E9phane?= <Stephane.Riviere@...>
> >
> >Fine !
> >Really send it !
> >But if you want to have some feedback i think we need to send it too !
> >I mean, i can write a letter and said that all wizzard think that.. How can
> >they be sure that all wizzard really think that ? (and not only yourself..).
> >What about the idea that each who agree with you send it to verant ?
> >
> >yakos
> > wizzard of karana
> >
> >you can add me to the list...
> >
> >
> >
> >-----Start Letter-----
> >
> >Dear EverQuest Staff,
> >
> >We are a large group of wizards who have come together through a mailing
> >list. Through much discussion and debate, we have agreed to send you
> >this feedback concerning improvements to the wizard. We would like to
> >thank you in advance for your careful consideration of these
> >modifications.
> >
> >1) Spells are 100% resisted by mobs 6+ levels above the caster. In large
> >groups hunting big prey this level cap turns a wizard from the main
> >dealer of damage to a useless member in the group. Our suggestion is
> >that either the cap be raised to 6+ levels of the highest member in the
> >group, or the cap be raised to 8+ levels higher than the caster.
> >
> >2) Spells that both stun and damage targets are often resisted by mobs
> >that /con green and blue. If this is the result of the stun effect, we
> >would like one spell without this effect at the same level.
> >
> >3) Many spell suggestions have crossed this list. Here is one that we
> >all feel would be a great addition.
> >
> >Tap Affinity - Teleport targeted group member to their own bind spot
> >
> >4) O'Kiels Radiation seems that it would be the beginning of a great
> >line of spells. Why should it end there? Cold and Magic based
> >buffs/shields would be a very welcome addition.
> >
> >5) Wizards seem to be very neglected when it comes to carrying or
> >wearing items that enhance our appearance. Also, many completely
> >different spells have the same visual effects.
> >
> >
> >We would like to thank you again for your time. Any type of feedback
> >would be greatly appriciated.
> >
> >
> >Sincerely,
> >
> >The Wizards of Norrath
> >eq_wizards@onelist.com
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >With more than 17 million e-mails exchanged daily...
> >http://www.onelist.com
> >...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!
>
> Silverion
> High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
> Fenin Ro
>
> http://www.tip.it/wizard
>
> moderator mailto:_EQ_magic@onelist.com
>
